snippet: An agreement with Time Warner Cable restores CBS and its related channels, like Showtime, to millions of cable subscribers largely in three major cities, New York, Los Angeles and Dallas.
abstract: CBS and Time Warner Cable end protracted contract dispute with CBS winning not only a significant financial increase for its programming, but also its stake in the digital future; agreement between the two sides restores CBS network and its related channels to millions of cable subscribers largely in major cities New York, Los Angeles and Dallas; outcome underscores leverage that owners of important television content retain over distributors like cable systems.
lead_paragraph: An agreement with Time Warner Cable restores CBS and its related channels, like Showtime, to millions of cable subscribers largely in three major cities, New York, Los Angeles and Dallas.

headline.main: CBS Returns, Triumphant, to Cable Box
headline.print_headline: CBS Returns, Triumphant, To Cable Box
